MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Gordon Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 11.12AM. Our engineers have arrived on site at Strathdee substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.41PM on 03 April 2021.
